components.name: Three.js
components.description: Powerful JavaScript framework for creating 3D worlds in your browser web. Imagines 3D avatars interacting with each other!

components.name: GROQ SDK
components.description: Allows interaction with a dynamic and modular database. It enables us to manage information about avatars, user actions, and more.

components.name: Gemma2-9B-it
components.description: Google's language model, great for understanding natural language and generating answers, descriptions, or even actions based on user commands.

goals.aim: Users of your Telegram channel @Avatars_Pibot can create and control 3D avatars.
goals.functionality: Gemma 2-9B-it will interpret their commands and make the avatars interact in a dynamic 3D environment created with Three.js.
goals.management: GROQ SDK handles data and system integrity.
